DOC.brief_title: Changes Cerebral Oxygenation During Anesthesia Induction
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate relationship cerebral oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) pressure carbon dioxide ( PaCO2 ) oxygen ( PaO2 ) arterial blood identify covariates rSO2 PaCO2 PaO2 period anesthesia induction .
DOC.criteria: Patients include study ethnic Chinese , 18 65 year old , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status I II , undergo radical operation mastocarcinoma . Patients exclude body mass index exceed 30 kg/m2 , history hypertension diabetes mellitus , allergic anesthesia drug use study .
